title: Natural Glass
creator_credit: New Zealand National Film Unit, Derek Wright and John King
brief_description: Looks at a one-man revival of “natural” glass-making in New Zealand, contrasting the delicacies of glass making by one man with his normal job as a worker in a natural gas field.
